newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Trans World Air cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Trans World Air cut.

text.p: -- Lehman Brothers downgraded Trans World Airlines Inc to outperform from buy, a market source said.
-- Lehman analyst Brian Harris said in a research note that the downgrade was due to weaker than expected third quarter 1996 operating performance.

-- "Although much of the third quarter disappointment can be attributed to near-term items, we feel the core business is not improving as quickly as we had expected. We therefore believe a more cautious, though still positive, outlook is appropriate," he said.
